description: Casual weekdays in the city, relaxed weekends in your favorite mountain town - the Cambrion is a lightweight flannel you’ll pull on pretty much anytime, anywhere. The Sawyer™ cotton blend is naturally comfortable, and has polyester fibres for technical performance. Classic button-front style gets a cleaner look with a straight hem and pocketless front.
name: Arcteryx Cambrion Shirt LS - Mens
